summary: An American bar room pianist and his prostitute girlfriend go on a trip through the Mexican underworld to collect a bounty on the head of a dead gigolo.
cast: Warren Oates|Isela Vega|Robert Webber|Gig Young|Helmut Dantine|Emilio Fernández|Kris Kristofferson|Chano Urueta|Donnie Fritts|Jorge Russek|Chalo González|Don Levy|Enrique Lucero|Janine Maldonado|Tamara Garina|Farnesio de Bernal|Ahui Camacho|Monica Miguel|Paco Pharrez|Juan Manuel Díaz|René Dupeyrón|Yolanda Ponce|Juan Jose Palacios|Manolo|Nery Ruiz|Roberto Dumont|Armando Acosta|Richard Bright|Queta Carrasco|Conrad Hool|Whitey Hughes|Cecilia Leger|Antonio Leo|Velia Lupercio|Rubén Márquez|Sharon Peckinpah|Garner Simmons
keywords: bounty hunter|anti hero|neo western|one man army|grave
title: Quiero la cabeza de Alfredo García
